title: 118. The Codependency Chronicles: People Pleasing Isn’t Who You Are, It’s What You Learned
itunes:title: The Codependency Chronicles: People Pleasing Isn’t Who You Are, It’s What You Learned
description:
In this episode of The Self Love Fix Podcast, I’m discussing the root cause of people-pleasing and how to break the habit. People-pleasing is a core symptom of codependency, and overcoming these tendencies can be a long process. But I promise you - it is well worth the inner work!

Here are a few points I cover: 

  • People-pleasing isn’t who you are, it’s what you do
  • The brain’s unconscious response
  • How to break the habit

Most importantly, I hope that if you see this pattern in yourself, you’re able to treat yourself with the compassion and care it takes to move forward toward self-love & inner peace. 

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

Sign up for my free 4 day live challenge from Sep 13-16 here!
